alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 28 at 7:34AM EDT until October 01 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following county, Collier. * WHEN...Until 1045 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 734 AM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 4 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naples, Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Lely Resort, Naples Manor, Belle Meade, East Naples, Marco Island Airport, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Golden Gate, Royal Palm Hammock, Vineyards, North Naples, Naples Park, Cape Romano, Everglades National Park, Lely, Fiddlers Creek, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve and Goodland. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
